user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (mark.thompson@techcorp.com) with an overview of the team’s performance on Project Titan, and remind her she can consult her Gmail and Notion for the information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Project Titan Team Performance Overview

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me an overview of our team’s performance on Project Titan at your earliest convenience? If it helps, you can reference any notes or reports you’ve stored in your Gmail or Notion workspace.

Thank you very much for your guidance and support.

Best regards,
Mark Thompson  
mark.thompson@techcorp.com

final_output:
